AbilityBonusOption.Description: Enables Conclave improvements e increases research by 50% quando the production queue is empty.
Enables Fortress improvements e increases the level of unità trained here by 1. Select this alla dedicate your city alla defense e military pursuits.
Enables Town improvements e increases Zone of Control by 1. Select this alla dedicate your city alla growth e financial pursuits.
Archivists increase the Research a city provides by 50% quando the city's production queue is empty.
Guild Grocers improve the Punti per Colpire of all your unità by 10%.
Infirmaries provide +1 Growth e heal 10 Punti per Colpire per season alla unità that are stationed in the city.
An Oracle allows you alla tap into the magic of Elemental, adding an additional Essence alla the city.
Scroll Scribes increase Research by 20% e make scrolls available for your champions alla purchase.
Slums increase the Growth of your city by 3, but also increase Unrest by 10%.
Strike Garrisons give all unità trained in this city the Impulsive trait (the ability alla go first in combattimento).
+50% Gildar quando the queue is empty.
Watchtowers give defending unità +5 alla Iniziativa e provide the city with a free Catapult quando defending.
The Academy of Revelation increases the Research produced by in all your cities by 10%.
An Almshouse shows a city's compassion for the least of its citizens. It increases your Faction Prestige by 1.
Amethyst Vaults provide +1 Crystal per season.
Embassies produce 1 Influence per Season.
Gallows remind your citizens of their civic duty. With them there is no Unrest penalty alla Production.
Governor's Office gives you +1 Production per Material in all of your cities.
The Mining Guild provides +1 Metal per season.
Prisons reduce Unrest in your cities by 10% but decreases the Growth of this city by 1.
A legendary wonder of a past age, the Pyre of Anniellum produces 3 Mana per season e strengthens your Fire spells.
The Great Arena increases your Faction Prestige by 1. All unità trained in this city will have +1 alla Attacco e +3 alla Punti per Colpire.
Placing a Guild Lendinghouse in your city gives you 2000 gildar.
The Guild Tribunal manages all your craftsmen, increasing your production per Material by 2 across your empire.

What was once a natural spring, which remained cool even in the hottest summers, became a popular destination for travelers e a place where even warring tribes could meet in peace e relax. After the cataclysm the waters of the spring were still revered e a magnificent bathhouse was built around them.
The Mint of Ruvenna produces 3 Gildar per Material in the city.

This throne is carved from a single piece of onyx, as brilliant e dark as the sea at night. Anyone standing before it can see their reflection within its depths, but in the reflection they are weak e prostrate.
Tenfell University keeps this city's Unrest from effecting Research.
The Tower of the Magi increases the spell resistance of all unità produced in this city by 10 e protects the city from the spells of enemy casters.
+1 Earth power, -50% alla Armor production times.
